entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OverflowOnFluentCall is flaky #65910
  • [API Proposal]: Breaking change - Make some types static #65909
  • Shift core projects from netcore3.1 to net6.0 #65905

Closed

  • Possible Optimization: An attribute to force the generation of a jump table for a switch on integer #65703
  • VSCode tasks are broken #65803
  • Automating nullable enable over thousands of csproj #65852
    Next
  • PR 64583 broke LSP-based XAML intellisense #65888
    17.5 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65904
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65902
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Bind and emit Primary Constructor #65899
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Remove a bunch of compatibility shims for TypeScript #65897
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Remove mutable state from rename #65848
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65911
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65892
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use `dotnet` instead of `.dotnet/dotnet` in VSCode tasks #65804
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Relayer our project system #65890
    Area-IDE
  • Log ServiceHub process exit code on failure #65823
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll in Solution support for Enable nullable refactoring #61879
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65908
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • (main) disable document outline by default #65896
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65903
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65901
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move classification tests to new framework #65734
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix XAML LSP by using a queue provider instead of subclassing #65898
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65900
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65895
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move Generate from usage tests to new framework #65887
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Disable document outline #65688
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing

Updated

  • Fix inline rename in MAUI #65818
    Area-IDE
  • Pass cancellation token consistently through lsif generator. #65875
    Area-IDE
  • Change property in Rename system to be clearer #65855
    Area-IDE
  • Remove code for cloning compilations for skeleton references #65842
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify lsif generation concepts #65858
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify GlobalKeywordRecommender #65814
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Remove options that have the same editorconfig name #65800
    Area-IDE
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Use the inner pattern to recreate the decision DAG for is-expressions #65878
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Update all linked files to have the same content object instances when updating the workspace's solution. #65885
    Area-IDE
  • Move BasicBuild to new integration test framework and implement #65889
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional preprocessor directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for draft of semantic tokens LSIF spec to LSIF generator #65860
    Area-IDE, Community
